name: async-toolbox
description: A toolbox of utilities to help with async (promise-based) transformations

scripts.test-watch: nodemon --watch src/ -e ts --exec 'npm run test-node || echo "failed"'
scripts.coverage: npm run test-cover && nyc report --reporter=html && open coverage/index.html
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist; bash -c 'shopt -s globstar; rm src/**/*.js src/**/*.map src/**/*.d.ts'

author: Gordon Burgett (gordon@gordonburgett.net)
